mapper.select: SELECT SELL.SELL_NO, SELL.SELL_TITLE, SELL.SELL_CONTENT, SELL.SELL_PRICE, SELL.SELL_AREA, SELL.PRODUCT_CONDITION, SELL.MEMBER_ID, SELL.WRITE_DATE, SELL.MOD_DATE, SELL.SELL_CONDITION, SELL.VIEW_COUNT, SELL.MEMBER_NICKNAME, IMAGE.IMG1, IMAGE.IMG2, IMAGE.IMG3 FROM MARKET_SELL SELL INNER JOIN MARKET_IMAGE IMAGE ON SELL.SELL_NO = IMAGE.SELL_NO WHERE SELL.SELL_NO = #{sellNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MARKET_COMMENT WHERE SELL_NO = #{sellNo}
SELECT C.*, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME FROM MARKET_COMMENT C JOIN MEMBER M ON C.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID WHERE SELL_NO = #{sellNo} ORDER BY WRITE_DATE ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MARKET_SELL VALUES(SEQ_SELLNO.NEXTVAL, #{sellTitle}, #{sellContent}, #{sellPrice}, #{sellArea}, #{productCondition}, #{memberId}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, #{memberNickname})
INSERT INTO MARKET_COMMENT VALUES(SEQ_MARKETCOMMENTNO.NEXTVAL, #{sellNo}, #{memberId}, #{commentContent}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT)
mapper.update: UPDATE MARKET_SELL SET VIEW_COUNT = VIEW_COUNT + 1 WHERE SELL_NO = #{sellNo}
UPDATE MARKET_SELL SET SELL_CONDITION = 'soldout' WHERE SELL_NO = #{sellNo}
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_POINT = MEMBER_POINT + #{paymentPrice} WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{sellerId}

UPDATE MARKET_SELL SET SELL_TITLE = #{sellTitle}, SELL_CONTENT = #{sellContent}, SELL_PRICE = #{sellPrice}, SELL_AREA = #{sellArea}, PRODUCT_CONDITION = #{productCondition}, MOD_DATE = DEFAULT WHERE SELL_NO = #{sellNo}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM MARKET_SELL WHERE SELL_NO = #{sellNo} AND MEMBER_ID = #{loginMemberId}
